word_mean_info__list.difference: 指某事物由于特别优秀或特别有意义而显得重要与突出。
最普通用词，指有权威、有影响的人或值得注意的、有价值的事物。

word_group.brief_definition: 显著增加；大幅增加；大量增加
明显差异；显著差异；重大差异
最重大的；最显著的；最明显的
重大变化；显著变化；重大改变
统计学显著；统计显著；统计学意义
不显著；不明显；无显著意义的
显著变化；重大变化；显著改变
重大部分；重要部分；显著部分

bilingual.source: The most significant event of all is fasting.
The Chinese Spring Festival is regarded as the most significant festival of the year among the Chinese.
bilingual.target: 中国春节被认为是中国人一年中最重要的节日。
江户城是一个重要的地标。

bilingual.source: The oly torch relay is a significant event.
bilingual.target: 奥林匹克火炬接力是一个重要的活动。
李基在非洲做出了重要的发现。

bilingual.source: The Olympic torch relay is a significant event.
bilingual.target: 奥林匹克火炬接力是一项重要的活动。
发生了在活动期间没有什么重要的事情。

bilingual.source: Each verse in the Bible has a significant meaning.
bilingual.target: 圣经中的每一段诗句都有重要的意义。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been tracking Sciarra ever since. And what have you found? Nothing significant yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从那之后我就开始追查斯艾拉。有什么发现？没什么重要的。

yingyinNormal.en: So anybody who's here today with your significant other, just turn over to them and swab their mouth, send it to the lab and you'll know for sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁今天是和你重要的另一半一起来的，只要转过去，刮下他／她的口腔寄到那个实验室你就知道了。

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't treat, you could lose significant yield. So Greg calls in an air strike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不处理就会遭受很大的损失。因此格雷格呼叫了空中打击。

yingyinNormal.en: Still, it's pretty significant that climate change is actually affecting the gravity on our planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然气候变迁正影响着地心引力。

yingyinNormal.en: The computations required to overcome the deployability issues are more significant than we thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 计算需要克服的部署性问题要比我们之前预想的要大了许多。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Penny, this is a natural human process and we're talking about statistically significant savings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是很自然的人类进程，而且我们讨论怎么省钱的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: But of all these anomalies, the most significant is this: Out near Saturn, a disturbance of space-time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在所有的异常现象中，最为显著的是在土星附近，时空发生了畸变。

yingyinNormal.en: I have read countless CVR transcripts of deceased pilots and I have significant accident investigation experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我读过无数牺牲机长的驾驶舱通话录音副本，也有相当多的事故调查经验。

yingyinNormal.en: As 2014 comes to an end, we can enter the New Year with new confidence that America is making significant strides where it counts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 2014年马上就要结束了，我们怀着信心走进新的一年，美国在体现她价值的地方，正发生着显著的变化。

yingyinNormal.en: As she said, she feels not significant enough to be addressed, not poor enough for people to worry about, and not rich enough to be cared about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如同她信中所说的，她们家“很普通无法引起重视，不是穷到不行能得到别人的关心，也不是富得流油能受到眷顾”。

yingyinNormal.en: But the sign and the tape are coated with a layer of dust, which indicates that the elevator has been nonfunctional for a significant amount of time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但提示和带子上都积了一层灰，表明电梯不能用有好长时间了。

yingyinNormal.en: In short, any one who told you that you would someday be able to make any significant contribution to physics, played a cruel trick on you, a cruel trick indeed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简单来说如果谁告诉你们你们有朝一日能在物理学上有所建树，那完全是个残忍的笑话，太残忍了。

yingyinNormal.en: Traveling at 17,500 miles an hour, he experienced an effect known as time dilation, and one day the same effect might make significant time travel to the future commonplace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时，他在太空时的行驶速度为每小时17500英里。他体验了一种名为"时间膨胀"的效应。而且，終一天 这种效应将会让穿越时空之时间更持久也变以家常便饭的事。

yingyinNormal.en: What they had was dopa-responsive dystonia. And so they were given L-Dopa, and their symptoms did improve, but they weren't totally asymptomatic. Significant problems remained.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多巴反应性肌张力失常。所以采用L－多巴治疗，他们的病情确实有所改善，但是并没有完全消除。仍然存在严重的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: He probably feels that it's doubtful that his mother will be overly impressed with his dating a woman whose most significant achievement is memorizing the Cheesecake Factory menu.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他可能是觉得他妈妈很难认同他跟一个生平最高成就就是背下芝士蛋糕工厂菜单的女人约会。

yingyinNormal.en: Over time, I leaned that by nature, most people's greatest strengths are also connected to their most significant weaknesses. And striving hard for big things is bound to lead you to painful falls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢慢的我发现从天性上来说，许多人最大的长处和他们最大的弱点相联系。为了高目标努力拼搏肯定会有跌痛的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: I think we have to be honest with ourselves. There was definitely a marketing element to it. I mean, he's a hometown guy. The area has a significant Asian-American population. And the way it played out. You know, people went bonkers for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说实话我们得对自己坦诚一些，签林书豪进来肯定是考虑到了市场因素。我的意思是说他是我们自己家乡人，这里有很大比重的亚裔人口。一切都证明了确实是那样的，湾区的球迷为他疯狂。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 显著；重要性；意义；含义；统计显著性
adj. 微不足道的；无足轻重的；无意义的；无权无势的
adj. 重要的；值得注意的；显著的；有特定含义的；表示…的；有效的；意味深长的

word_family.mean: v. 指示；表示；表明；相互吹牛；相互辱骂；要紧；作为…的符号；有… 的意思

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention

examination_example.sentence: They also need better public relations skills than their predecessors, as the costs of even a minor slipup can be <highlight>significant</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与他们的前辈相比，他们还需要更好的公关技巧，因为即使是一个小小的失误也可能带来巨大的代价。

examination_example.sentence: But perhaps the most <highlight>significant</highlight> reason is that the issue has always been so politically charged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但或许最重要的原因是，这个问题一直都带有政治色彩。

examination_example.sentence: Conversely, if homework matters, it should account for a <highlight>significant</highlight> portion of the grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，如果家庭作业很重要，它应该占成绩的很大一部分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 显著；重要性；意义；含义；统计显著性
adj. 微不足道的；无足轻重的；无意义的；无权无势的
adj. 重要的；值得注意的；显著的；有特定含义的；表示…的；有效的；意味深长的

word_family.mean: v. 指示；表示；表明；相互吹牛；相互辱骂；要紧；作为…的符号；有… 的意思

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention

examination_example.sentence: One of the most <highlight>significant</highlight> pieces of news from the US in early 2017 was the efforts of Google to make autonomous driving a reality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据美媒2017年报道，谷歌正努力让无人驾驶成为现实。这是2017年初美国报道过的最重要的新闻之一。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers believed students with high ACT scores would not show a <highlight>significant</highlight> decrease in performance due to their use of digital devices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，ACT得分高的学生的表现不会因为使用电子设备而出现显著下降。

examination_example.sentence: Among the more <highlight>significant</highlight> problem with the Census's measure is that it is based on surveys rather than data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人口普查(Census)措施中更重要的问题是:它是基于调查而不是基于数据。

sense_info_list.en: having a particular meaning; indicative of something

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 显著；重要性；意义；含义；统计显著性
adj. 微不足道的；无足轻重的；无意义的；无权无势的

word_family.mean: adj. 重要的；值得注意的；显著的；有特定含义的；表示…的；有效的；意味深长的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention

examination_example.sentence: But if you're struggling with real boredom and the emptiness it provokes, consider whether you might seek new connections and more <highlight>significant</highlight> challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果你正与真正的无聊以及其引发的空虚作斗争，考虑一下你是否可以寻求新的人脉和更大的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: The fifth largest city in the US passed a <highlight>significant</highlight> soda tax proposal that will levy (征税) 1.5cents per liquid ounce on distributors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国第五大城市通过了一项意义重大的汽水税提案，该提案将对经销商征收每液体盎司1.5美分的税。

examination_example.sentence: Dating back to 1880, the most common living arrangement among young adults has been living with a romantic partner, whether a spouse or a <highlight>significant</highlight> other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间回溯到1880年，年轻人最常见的生活安排是与爱侣生活在一起，无论是配偶还是重要的另一半。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 显著；重要性；意义；含义；统计显著性
adj. 微不足道的；无足轻重的；无意义的；无权无势的

word_family.mean: adj. 重要的；值得注意的；显著的；有特定含义的；表示…的；有效的；意味深长的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention

examination_example.sentence: Art generates money and holds <highlight>significant</highlight> emotional and cultural value within communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术能赚钱，并在社区内具有重要的情感和文化价值。

examination_example.sentence: The environmental challenges are <highlight>significant</highlight> but the efforts made by the Tanzania National Park Authority seem to be paying off .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然说环境挑战任重道远，不过这样看来坦桑尼亚国家公园管理局做出的努力还是初见成效了。

examination_example.sentence: Whether you're looking at wallpaper or paint, the time, effort and relative expense put into it are <highlight>significant</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管你是在看墙纸还是油漆，花在上面的时间、精力和相关费用都是很重要的。
